page.title: 09HOLTON AREA POLICING
page.content: Policing of Holton,Lissington and Wickenby is controlled by Lincolnshire Police's Divisional HQ at Gainsborough There are 2 types of uniform policing operated within the area.Response Policing and Reassurance Policing. Response Policing provided by 3 Instant Responce Vehicles giving 24hr. cover, responding to urgent calls. Reassurance Policing provided by "Bobby on the beat". Their role is that of the traditional policeman with own rural beat.There are 3 Police Offices (Police homes) & Market Rasen Police Station providing Reassurance Policing. Mkt. Rasen covers Lissington, Welton Police Office, Wickenby & Nettleham covers Holton. There is thankfully little crime of consequence in the block.
